name: images-compare
description: A jquery plugin for comparing two images

scripts.copy:hammerjs: copy node_modules/hammerjs/hammer.min.js > build/hammer.min.js; copy node_modules/hammerjs/hammer.min.js.map > build/hammer.min.js.map; copy node_modules/hammerjs/hammer.js > build/hammer.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run copy && npm run minify
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.copy: npm run copy:js && npm run copy:hammerjs && npm run copy:css
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
